sub_title: Senior process facilitator, trainer and consultant for strategic multi-stakeholder initiatives, organizational development processes, conferences and events.
summary:
What if people feel fulfilled and engaged at work, and organizations thrive by having a positive impact in the world? 

I believe that individuals naturally feel a need for contribution and meaning in their lives.  Through my work I provide tools and programs to support individuals in this journey of self discovery and empowerment and support organisations and companies in creating an environment where fulfillment, purpose and contribution are the driving forces. I am passionate about creating spaces for human interactions. I believe that through these interactions we are able to fully develop our talents and skills and find a meaningful way to use them.

Expertise: Educational Adult learning/ Workshop Facilitation & Group Facilitation/ Art of Hosting / Nonviolent Communication (NVC)/ Training and Development / Hosting practices for Social Innovation / Social entrepreneurship/ Participatory leadership/ Capacity Building & Community Management / Content curation for e-learning/ Organizational Team Development/Deep Democracy

treasury_media.title: The Impact I had
treasury_media.description: I truly believe that every person on Earth has some amazing talents and precious gifts to share and it is our duty as human beings to discover these talents and find a meaningful way to fully use them to serve humanity.

projects.title: ACTION LABs
projects.description:
Ebbf Action Labs have been created with one vision in mind:
Contributing to a prosperous, sustainable and just civilization,
one conversation, one action, one community at a time.

Ebbf has developed a “meaningful conversation” methodology to bring these conversations on a local level and empower individuals and local communities to step into actions.

profile_positions.description:
https://sensetribe.com/

• Senior facilitator and consultant for strategic multi-stakeholder meetings, events and
conferences through participatory leadership methodologies.

SenseTribe Consulting is an international multidisciplinary team of professionals specialised in projects that contribute to the UN Sustainable Development Goals. SenseTribe offers consulting services around participatory processes for events, stakeholder communication, organisational development, policy development and product and service innovation. By putting effective collaboration, collective wellbeing and creativity at the centre, SenseTribe designs processes that foster awareness, collaborative practices and authentic partnership.

Projects I've been part of: 
• Co-facilitator for DAFNE’s PEXForum 2020 - Donors & Foundations Network in Europe
• Trainer & facilitator for WINGS Network - Worldwide initiatives for Grantmakers support
• Facilitator & Process Designer - Principles Project (Human Rights Funders Network / Ariadne / PAWHR)
• Lead facilitator - Daylight Academy Annual conference
profile_positions.title: Senior Facilitator and Consultant (Participatory Processes)

profile_positions.description:
https://www.grassrootsfacilitation.com/
Supporting leaders to facilitate change in their organizations, communities and initiatives.

• Art of Hosting trainer & facilitator (AoH Social Innovation Amsterdam 2015-2022)
• Accompany social entrepreneurs & intrapreneurs, developmental NGOs, social innovators and
convenors of cross-sectors dialogues in designing and organising key interventions to engage their community of partners, customers, investors, employees and key stakeholders at large
• Facilitation services: Supporting leaders to facilitate change in their organizations, communities and initiatives through Participatory Leadership.
• Trainings (Art of Hosting, Nonviolent Communication, Deep Democracy, Going Horizontal,
Wellbeing in the workplace, Capacity Building, Community management, Theory U)
profile_positions.title: Founder of Grassroots Facilitation - Trainer & Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
The Art of Hosting is an approach to leadership that scales up from the personal to the systemic using personal practice, dialogue, facilitation and the co-creation of innovation to address complex challenges. 

AoH utilizes diverse practices for active dialogue and collective intelligence to resolve conflict, make decisions and initiate change. It is highly participatory, productive, and transformative as people are hosted to share and welcome diverse perspectives. Each discussion is designed around a powerful question which is explored through the use of participatory technologies such as ProAction Cafè, Open Space Technology, Circle, Appreciative Inquiry, World Cafè and Action Learning.
profile_positions.title: AoH Facilitator and Practitioner

profile_positions.description:
Impact Hub Global is the largest global network of social & environmental innovators/entrepreneurs 
A highly entrepreneurial, multicultural, fast-changing, virtual and collaborative context. 
(100+ Open Impact Hubs, 700+ Makers and 15,000 members across the entire globe). 
http://www.impacthub.net/

I coordinate the Learning & Development activities of our Global Network and support the implementation of "Communities of Practice" (CoP) across the international Impact Hubs. 
Supported learning activities and sharing of best practice and knowledge through e-learning platforms, online and virtual training, on-site development activities and training, international gatherings and regional activities and programs.

Impact Hub Capacity Building efforts are aimed at enabling Makers to develop, up-skill and support each other in the search of running successful Impact Hubs and achieving mastery in their professions.  In essence, it refers to the commonwealth of knowledge, resources and practices available in our network to help Makers around the world build, scale and restart successful Impact Hubs.
profile_positions.title: Makers Learning & Development Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Impact Hub Global is the largest global network of social & environmental innovators/entrepreneurs (Impact Hub, with 60+ Hubs and 8,000 members across the entire globe). 

I coordinate the talent development and acquisition of our global team and support the on boarding of new teams that want to join out network of change makers across the world.  

Impact Hub actively implements organizational development and change management frameworks such as Holacracy, Theory of Change, Participatory leadership, Art of hosting and Theory U, to foster collaboration and innovation.

- Coordinate the key activities of the "Impact Hub Africa Seed Program" which include developing location, timeline, execution of strategy and recruitment to go from 1 current Impact Hub location in the continent (Johannesburg) to 7 by the end of the one-year program

company.name: ebbf - ethical business building the future

volunteer_experiences.description:
EBBF is a non-governmental organisation dedicated to bringing ethical values, personal virtues and moral leadership into workplaces. EBBF's Vision is to contribute to a prosperous, sustainable and just civilization by promoting and applying ethical values, personal virtues and moral leadership in business and civil society. As EBBF member, I promote the ethic in business principles, working in my company and running project based on sustainability end CSR.
In October 2012 I coordinated EBBF ACTION LAB MILAN to help bringing EBBF's principles in my local community.
From 2015 I've been involved as International events coordinator.

http://ebbf.org/
